title: 40 Loops of Music
description: A multi-genre collection of music loops for many types of game settings. The pack includes dramatic/theatrical, suspense, world, and action-oriented techno/bass music.
longDescription:
Whether you need seamlessly looping background music for an exotic adventure, an action game, or creepy settings, or need menu music to build atmosphere, this pack has it for you! The pack contains 40 short(ish) music loops made with high quality sounds and ready for immediate use.

 

Loops of the following styles are included in the pack:

  • Dramatic/theatrical (10 loops)
  • Suspense/eerie/escapist ambient (10 loops)
  • Heavy bass/techno beats (10 loops)
  • Oriental/Latin (10 loops)

 

A preview containing 20 examples (5 from each style) of the loops in the pack is available at: https://soundcloud.com/rytmigorilla/40-loops-of-music

The looping point is included in every example, so you can listen how the music in the pack actually loops.
technicalDetails:
• 40 seamlessly looping tracks
  • Length varies from 0:30 to 1.16 (average length 0:39)
  • Total number of samples: 40
  • Total number of sound cues: 40
  • Total length of samples: 25:59
  • Sample quality: 44 100 Hz/16 bit stereo wav
  • Intended platforms: All (tested on PC)
